title: Terran Colonists vs Zerg and their Pointy Sticks - Cloak ICYFAR G2
excerpt: In this week’s episode of I Cast Your Freakin Awesome Replays (ICYFAR) players showed off their best cloaked and invisible unit plays. THIS WEEKS ICYFAR CHALLENGE: “One Geyser to Rule Them All” - You may only mine from one gas geyser for the entire game. Send submissions to eonblu95@gmail.com as attachment
